title: Barr License
description: Permissive license, allows for the modification and distribution of a work for commercial or non commercial use. If commercial use, author appreciates receiving a free copy of the work. GPL-incompatible.

must.title: Rename
must.description: Describes the ability to change software's name if modified/distributed.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Private Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use/modify software freely without distributing it.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

fulltext: This is a package of commutative diagram macros built on top of Xy-pic by Michael Barr (email: barr@barrs.org). Its use is unrestricted. It may be freely distributed, unchanged, for non-commercial or commercial use. If changed, it must be renamed. Inclusion in a commercial software package is also permitted, but I would appreciate receiving a free copy for my personal examination and use. There are no guarantees that this package is good for anything. I have tested it with LaTeX 2e, LaTeX 2.09 and Plain TeX. Although I know of no reason it will not work with AMSTeX, I have not tested it.
